description.value:
Trigger You are caught in the area of a hostile effect.

This magic takes advantage of disorienting explosions and gunfire to give its caster an opportunity to hide. You become undetected to all creatures that rely on visual senses unless they can see @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Invisible] creatures. You Step. If you have cover, greater cover, or concealment, attempt a Stealth check to Hide. The invisibility then ends, and you either become observed or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Hidden] to creatures as determined by your check to Hide, if you made one. If you remain in the area of the trigger, you gain a +2 status bonus to this Stealth check. If you are no longer in the area of the trigger, you gain a +2 status bonus to your Reflex save (if any) against the triggering effect.
